entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
